extends Object
    Represents sheet header/footer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SheetHeaderFooter

        public SheetHeaderFooter()
        SheetHeaderFooter constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultPage

        public HeaderFooterPage getDefaultPage()
        Gets default header/footer.

      • getEvenPage

        public HeaderFooterPage getEvenPage()
        Gets header/footer for even pages.

        If hasEvenPage() returns false, then default page will be used on even pages.

        This method is not supported when exporting to XLS file format.

      • getFirstPage

        public HeaderFooterPage getFirstPage()
        Gets first page header/footer.

        If hasDefaultPage() returns false, then default page will be used on first page.

        This method is not supported when exporting to XLS file format.

      • hasEvenPage

        public boolean hasEvenPage()
        Returns true if getEvenPage() header/footer is specified.

        If #hasEvenPage returns false, then getDefaultPage() will be used on even pages.

      • hasFirstPage

        public boolean hasFirstPage()
        Returns true if getFirstPage() header/footer is specified.

        If #hasFirstPage returns false, then default will be used on first page.

      • isAlignWithMargins

        public boolean isAlignWithMargins()
        Gets if header/footer margin will align with page margins. Supported in XLSX only.

      • isScaleWithDoc

        public boolean isScaleWithDoc()
        Gets if headers/footers will be scaled with document scaling.

      • setAlignWithMargins

        public void setAlignWithMargins(boolean alignWithMargins)
        Sets if header/footer margin will align with page margins. Supported in XLSX only.

      • setDefaultPage

        public void setDefaultPage(HeaderFooterPage value)
        Sets default header/footer.

      • setEvenPage

        public void setEvenPage(HeaderFooterPage value)
        Sets header/footer for even pages.

        If hasEvenPage() returns false, then default page will be used on even pages.

        This method is not supported when exporting to XLS file format.

      • setFirstPage

        public void setFirstPage(HeaderFooterPage value)
        Sets first page header/footer.

        If hasDefaultPage() returns false, then default page will be used on first page.

        This method is not supported when exporting to XLS file format.

      • setScaleWithDoc

        public void setScaleWithDoc(boolean scaleWithDoc)
        Sets if headers/footers will be scaled with document scaling.
